content:
On the day of March 21, the Navy of the Armed Forces destroyed the Russian reconnaissance drone.

About thisreportNavy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

“Naval sailors destroyed the reconnaissance drone. In the afternoon of March 21, in Odessa, the ship-and-naval forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine was shot down the reconnaissance drone of the Russian Federation. The Naval Forces of the Armed Forces, together with their brothers, continue to defend Ukraine from Russian invaders, ”the message reads.

As reported by the Armyinform, on the night of March 21, the Air Force of the Armed ForcesDestroyedAll the missiles that the Russians attacked Kiev.
title: In Odessa, military sailors knocked down the reconnaissance drone of the Russians
description: This was reported by the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. “Military sailors destroyed ...
author: Army Inform
